actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to amend title 23 of the District of Columbia Code to remove the automatic disqualification of any person who has been convicted of an offense involving moral turpitude from engaging in the bonding business in the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Amends the District of Columbia Code to remove the automatic disqualification of any person convicted of an offense involving moral turpitude from engaging in bail bonding business in the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 23 of the District of Columbia Code to remove the automatic disqualification of any person who has been convicted of an offense involving moral turpitude from engaging in the bonding business in the District of Columbia.
